curam.util.dom.html2
Class HTMLUtils

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.dom.html2.HTMLUtils

public final class HTMLUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for creating DOM Level 2 HTML elements.

Field Summary

          The option to use to specify that a content pane widget contains a single child widget.

          The options to use to specify that a tab container widget should not perform a layout operation.

createDocumentFragment

public static org.w3c.dom.DocumentFragment createDocumentFragment(org.w3c.dom.DocumentFragment fragment)
Creates a new document fragment for the same document that created the given document fragment.

Parameters:
fragment - An existing document fragment.
Returns:
A new document fragment.

createDocumentFragment

public static org.w3c.dom.DocumentFragment createDocumentFragment(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
Creates a new document fragment from the given document.

Parameters:
document - An existing document.
Returns:
A new document fragment.

appendTextAlt

public static java.lang.String appendTextAlt(org.w3c.dom.Node parentNode,
                                             java.lang.String text)
Appends text to the last existing text node of the parent node. If there is no such text node, a new text node is created and appended to the parent node. If the text is null or empty, no change is made.

Parameters:
parentNode - The node to which to append the text.
text - The text node value.
Returns:
The full modified text.

appendText

public static void appendText(org.w3c.dom.Node parentNode,
                              java.lang.String text)
Appends text to the last existing text node of the parent node. If there is no such text node, a new text node is created and appended to the parent node. If the text is null or empty, no change is made.

Parameters:
parentNode - The node to which to append the text.
text - The text node value.

appendTextNode

public static void appendTextNode(org.w3c.dom.Node parentNode,
                                  java.lang.String text)
Appends a new text node to the parent node if the text is not null or an empty string.

Parameters:
parentNode - The node to which to append the text.
text - The text node value.

appendComment

public static void appendComment(org.w3c.dom.Node parentNode,
                                 java.lang.String text)
Appends a new comment node to the parent node. If the text is null, an empty string will be used instead.

Parameters:
parentNode - The node to which to append the comment.
text - The comment text.

appendNbsp

public static void appendNbsp(org.w3c.dom.Node parentNode)
Appends a text node containing a non-breaking space to the parent node.

Parameters:
parentNode - The node to which to append the comment.

setAttributeIfValue

public static void setAttributeIfValue(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String value)
Sets the value of an attribute on an element if the attribute value is not null and not an empty string.

Parameters:
element - The element to which to add an attribute. Must not be null.
name - The name of the attribute. Must not be null.
value - The value of the attribute.

getUniqueID

public static java.lang.String getUniqueID()
Gets a unique ID that can be used for a HTML element. The IDs are based on a number that is incremented sequentially; unless there are more than two billion IDs required on one page, the IDs will be unique.

Returns:
A unique ID.

createElement

public static org.w3c.dom.Element createElement(org.w3c.dom.DocumentFragment fragment,
                                                java.lang.String tagName)
Creates a new DOM element from the parent document of the fragment.

Parameters:
fragment - The fragment used to access the document from which the element is to be created.
tagName - The tag name of the element.
Returns:
A new DOM element.

setWidgetProperties

public static void setWidgetProperties(org.w3c.dom.Element node,
                                       java.lang.String type,
                                       java.lang.String parentType)
Adds appropriate dojo layout widget class.

Parameters:
node - element being passed.
type - type of layout widget.
parentType - class to be assigned.

setWidgetProperties

public static void setWidgetProperties(org.w3c.dom.Element node,
                                       java.lang.String type,
                                       java.lang.String parentType,
                                       int options)
Adds appropriate Dojo layout widget class.

Parameters:
node - element being passed.
type - widget type of layout widget.
parentType - widget type of the parent.
options - a bit mask used to specify various options for the widget.
